name: wholesomeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being wholesome (= healthy or good for you): There is a growing concern about the wholesomeness of food. She is the epitome of all-American wholesomeness. See
wholesome
More examplesFewer examplesThey have a duty to monitor the wholesomeness of water in their areas. A reputation for cleanness and wholesomeness, once lost, takes years to regain.These people glow with health and wholesomeness.
